title: Anazarbos/Caesarea/Ioustin(ian)oupolis
description: Anazarbos or Anazarbus was an ancient city of Cilicia. It became the capital of Cilicia Secunda in the later Roman empire. The city was rebuilt in 527 following an earthquake and destroyed by Mamluk forces in 1374.

properties.description: 5M scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 7575
